ModMetaData.name: WM Smarter food selection
ModMetaData.author: Wishmaster, Vathand
ModMetaData.description: Requires HugsLib. Allows you to restrict the foods of your pawns (prisoners, animals, ascetic, cannibal). Assign and customize your food policies. Better food selection algorithm. Upgraded and smarter nutrient paste dispenser. Will pick ingredients in this order: raw bad > raw tasty > insect meat > human meat. The NPD will prioritize human meat for cannibals, and human meat then insect meat for animals. More... More information on the web link.
